org.smartfrog.services.xunit.base
Interface TestListener

All Superinterfaces:
LogListener, java.rmi.Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
XmlListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractListenerImpl, BufferingListenerImpl, BufferingListenerImpl.BufferingTestListener, ChainListener, ConsoleListenerImpl.ConsoleTestListener, NullListenerImpl, OneHostHtmlListener, OneHostXMLListener, StatisticsTestListenerImpl
public interface TestListener
extends LogListener

This is the interface that all testlisteners must implement. It is very similar to the junit.framework.TestListener interface, except it is designed for remoting.

Instead of passing real tests around, we have a TestInfo class that contains summary data about the test. If a fault occurred, that is inserted into the testInfo that we add created 14-Apr-2004 16:56:58
